body:
Pop culture has turned us into a generation that believes men just want to watch Football on Sundays and occasionally get dragged to church by their wives; but look at the successful churches, look at Islam as it spreads over the globe, look at Jews as their faith community becomes powerful...noticed anything about them? 

That's right - it's your job as a man to keep the faith, not only for yourself, but for your family.
body_html:
Pop culture has turned us into a generation that believes men just want to watch Football on Sundays and occasionally get dragged to church by their wives; but look at the successful churches, look at Islam as it spreads over the globe, look at Jews as their faith community becomes powerful...noticed anything about them?

That's right - it's your job as a man to keep the faith, not only for yourself, but for your family.
title: Western religion has become feminized, for generations now it's considered "the wife's choice" whether or not the family attends church or prays - and the declining role of faith in society is proof that needs to stop. Husbands, step it up and start insisting on your family going to the church/mosque/synagogue of your choice - tell them they're going to volunteer for readings and vacuuming, decree who's going to say Grace before dinner tonight.

body: But do not be called Rabbi, for One is your Teacher, and you are all brothers. Do not call anyone on earth your father, for One is your Father, He who is in heaven. Do not be called leaders, for One is your Leader, that is, Christ. But the greatest among you shall be your servant. Whoever exalts himself shall be humbled; and whoever humbles himself shall be exalted.
body_html: But do not be called Rabbi, for One is your Teacher, and you are all brothers. Do not call anyone on earth your father, for One is your Father, He who is in heaven. Whoever exalts himself shall be humbled; and whoever humbles himself shall be exalted.

body: The Western church has become a place of business. Once you take on a building along with a monthly mortgage, electrical bill, staff, music equipment then the goal of the Sunday service is not to preach the gospel but to get enough butts in the seats and reap enough donations to make your bills. This means compromise, which we see in Western churches in spades. It also means catering to your best customers: Women. Men need a bible, other men and a couple of hours a week to be strong christian leaders. Women want the christian "experience" and spend significantly more money on religious products than men do. From music, bible studies, books, retreats - all stuff that might be bible centric, but isn't the bible and often times leads people away from the true message of the Word. This has caused Western churches to denigrate their men and treat them as afterthoughts, as well as to disregard scripture that place women under the authority of their fathers first, then their husbands. Christ may be the foundation of the church, but the load-bearing beams are the men. As the church weakens its men, the church itself will collapse, and society with it. Shameful.
body_html: The Western church has become a place of business. Once you take on a building along with a monthly mortgage, electrical bill, staff, music equipment then the goal of the Sunday service is not to preach the gospel but to get enough butts in the seats and reap enough donations to make your bills. This means compromise, which we see in Western churches in spades. It also means catering to your best customers: Women. Men need a bible, other men and a couple of hours a week to be strong christian leaders. Women want the christian "experience" and spend significantly more money on religious products than men do. From music, bible studies, books, retreats - all stuff that might be bible centric, but isn't the bible and often times leads people away from the true message of the Word. This has caused Western churches to denigrate their men and treat them as afterthoughts, as well as to disregard scripture that place women under the authority of their fathers first, then their husbands. Christ may be the foundation of the church, but the load-bearing beams are the men. As the church weakens its men, the church itself will collapse, and society with it. Shameful.

body: Thank you. This has been a subject of mine these past ten years. The West is failing, and while many christians complain about it they do little of what the Word of God prescribes for fixing it. The Church itself will never fall, but the church as we know it here on earth will, and must before the end, but why do we have to make it so easy for the enemy?

body: Yes, I got into it with my pastors when they told me I should ignore scripture that wasn't relevant for the current modern times. Considering how strong I thought these men were in the word I was quite disturbed. Indeed not understanding the truth and definition of love doesn't help. Christ Himself has been feminized and we are told to praise Him through "love" songs that sound more like pop tunes written by lovestruck boyfriends and girlfriends. There is a tenderness in Him, but when we reduce His entire being to only that tenderness we ignore His justice, His righteous anger and His desire that we conquer sin. He is a loving God but a fierce and jealous warrior. We do a great disservice to His name and the gospel by merely acting as fanboys and not as soldiers called to duty.

Pop culture has turned us into a generation that believes men just want to watch Football on Sundays and occasionally get dragged to church by their wives; but look at the successful churches, look at Islam as it spreads over the globe, look at Jews as their faith community becomes powerful...noticed anything about them?

That's right - it's your job as a man to keep the faith, not only for yourself, but for your family.
post.title: Western religion has become feminized, for generations now it's considered "the wife's choice" whether or not the family attends church or prays - and the declining role of faith in society is proof that needs to stop. Husbands, step it up and start insisting on your family going to the church/mosque/synagogue of your choice - tell them they're going to volunteer for readings and vacuuming, decree who's going to say Grace before dinner tonight.

author.bio: Just a guy on the internet who's avatar is a giant mutant crocodile. In my spare time I make wooden things, 3D artwork and work on my tabletop RPG, Destructive Tendencies.
author.bio_html: Just a guy on the internet who's avatar is a giant mutant crocodile. In my spare time I make wooden things, 3D artwork and work on my tabletop RPG, Destructive Tendencies.

body: I've been here for a couple of months, I think. I appreciate the lack of censorship and the fact that I can simply block annoying guilds or voices, as it should be. I'm not opposed to differing views but I don't need some sperg making all cap postings of racial slurs three days in a row because he has nothing better to do with his time. It's an interesting platform, let's see if it lasts.

guild.description:
All the articles, guides and memes you could want to perfect your role of the Traditional Husband. The perfect complement to the +TradWife. 

What does it mean to be a Traditional Husband? 
How to perfect your manliness? 
How to look after your wife? 
How do you best go about drawing boundaries? 
How to excel at being the provider and protector?

body: I can get behind this. I'm not a believer, I do not have any faith. Sometimes I wonder if it's just the representation, of God, from religion, or if I'm just that disconnected.

parent.body: Religion may be the root of many evils, but Christ is not a religion, He is a leader and a king over all. Religiosity is garbage and corrupts truth. However if you are not a believer or have no understanding of God then none of this will make sense to you. Otherwise have a good day.
parent.body_html: Religion may be the root of many evils, but Christ is not a religion, He is a leader and a king over all. Religiosity is garbage and corrupts truth. However if you are not a believer or have no understanding of God then none of this will make sense to you. Otherwise have a good day.

body:
Nah, a lot of people don't represent Christ very well. I cant speak for other faiths, but Jesus has been very feminized over the past century, and, surprise, is rather unappealing to a lot of men, and women, come to think of it. It's pretty sad because what most people think of when they think of Jesus is not who he is at all.

Also, thanks for being cool about your response. It's sad that seeing someone answer back with a real, genuine reply that's not snarky and snide should be so rare, especially when it comes to religious conversation . It's appreciated.
body_html:

It's pretty sad because what most people think of when they think of Jesus is not who he is at all.

Also, thanks for being cool about your response. It's sad that seeing someone answer back with a real, genuine reply that's not snarky and snide should be so rare, especially when it comes to religious conversation . It's appreciated.

body: I didn't intend for this guild to be a religious one but the concept of the trad husband of course has very strong religious ties. For me it was intended to be more about traditional gender roles. But I am more than happy for religious posts, as long as it is on topic. It's great to have your contributions!
